articles.description: If you are an audiophile, but don’t want to spend a huge amount of money, then these earbuds are perfect for you. Made for a more immersive listening experience, here we have listed 5 earbuds under Rs. 2500 – Realme Buds Air 3s, Noise Air Buds Pro 2, JBL Wave…
